data.name: #PerfMatters Conference
data.description: A two-day community Web Performance conference happening March 31 & April 1, 2020 in Redwood City, CA. Workhops on March 30, 2020 to help get people up to speed on Web Performance. Hackathon on April 2, 2020 to improve online performance documentation.

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Summit 2020
relatedRecords.description: Highlights from the Manchester AWS Community Summit held in Manchester 2019. Check our Channel to view the talks in full. Our next event will be held in October in London. If you’re interested in becoming a sponsor please contact joe@comsum.co.uk.
